casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Tyrone TARVER Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2016

Glenn W. Falk, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Kathryn W. Bare, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn.App. 304, 141 A.3d 940 (2016), is denied.
